list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a person or group of people standing outside a place of work or other venue, protesting something or trying to persuade others not to enter during a strike.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: bốn mươi picket đã bị bắt

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a soldier or party of soldiers performing a particular duty.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a picket of soldiers fired a volley over the coffin
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một người lính đã bắn một cú vô lê qua quan tài

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a pointed wooden stake driven into the ground, typically to form a fence or palisade or to tether a horse.
act as a picket outside (a workplace or other venue).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: strikers picketed the newspaper's main building
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tiền đạo đã chọn tòa nhà chính của tờ báo
